meta.description: Language labels for flexforms belonging to extension 'overheidsmediaplayer'

languageKey.label: General
Title
Description
Player settings
Width (in pixels)
Height (in pixels)
Show links to download video files (.webm, .mp4, .ogv, .mov, .wmv, if available) and additional audio track (mp3)
Show link to download caption file (.vtt)
Videos
Free and Open Source Video Optimized for Use on the Web (.webm for most modern web browsers) [Video Codec: VP8, Audio Codec: Vorbis]
Non-free but Widely Supported Video Format (.mp4, .m4v for most modern web browsers) [Video Codec: H.264 Baseline Level 1.3, Audio Codec: Low Complexity AAC (AAC-LC)]
Free and Open Source Video (.ogg, .ogv for modern web browsers which do not support the non-free MP4 video format) [Video Codec: Theora, Audio Codec: Vorbis]
Non-free Video for Flash Player (.flv for FlowPlayer fallback) [Sorenson Spark, vp6, H.264, HE-ACC]
Non-free Video for QuickTime Player (.mov for browser plugin fallback)
Non-free Video for Windows Media Player (.wmv for browser plugin fallback)
Image
Image when no player is available (.gif, .jpg, .jpeg, .png)
Caption
WebVTT Caption file (.vtt)
Transcription
Transcription
Additional Audio
Additional audio stream to be embedded in the player (.mp3)
Disable additional audio stream
